ViewObject.Name: ODSiteMgrHrchyAccessesVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT 1 FROM JTF_RS_REP_MANAGERS jrrm, JTF_RS_GROUP_USAGES jrgu, (SELECT CURR_ASSN.resource_id, CURR_ASSN.group_id from XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ASSN, HZ_PARTY_SITES CURR_PS, HZ_PARTY_SITES ALL_PS, HZ_PARTY_SITE_USES HZPSU, FND_LOOKUP_VALUES FNDL WHERE CURR_ASSN.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and CURR_ASSN.entity_id = CURR_PS.party_site_id and ALL_PS.party_site_id = :1 and ALL_PS.party_id = CURR_PS.party_id and HZPSU.party_site_id(+) = CURR_PS.party_site_id and FNDL.lookup_type = 'XXOD_ASN_PARTY_SEC_SITE_TYPES' and (nvl(CURR_PS.identifying_address_flag,'N') = 'Y' OR NVL(HZPSU.site_use_type,'*') = FNDL.lookup_code) and CURR_PS.status = 'A' and NVL(HZPSU.status,'A') = 'A' and CURR_ASSN.resource_id <> :2 and fnd_profile.value('XX_ASN_SITE_ACCESS')= 'T' and nvl(full_access_flag,'Y') = 'Y' union SELECT CURR_ASSN.resource_id, CURR_ASSN.group_id FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ASSN WHERE CURR_ASSN.entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and CURR_ASSN.entity_id = :3 and CURR_ASSN.resource_id <> :4 and fnd_profile.value('XX_ASN_SITE_ACCESS')= 'T' and nvl(full_access_flag,'Y') = 'Y' union SELECT CURR_ASSN.resource_id, CURR_ASSN.group_id FROM XX_TM_NAM_TERR_CURR_ASSIGN_V CURR_ASSN, HZ_PARTY_SITES CURR_PS, HZ_PARTY_SITES ALL_PS WHERE entity_type = 'PARTY_SITE' and entity_id =ALL_PS.party_site_id and CURR_PS.party_site_id = :5 and CURR_PS.party_id = ALL_PS.party_id and resource_id <> :6 and fnd_profile.value('XX_ASN_SITE_ACCESS')= 'F' and nvl(full_access_flag,'Y') = 'Y') aaa where jrgu.usage IN ('SALES', 'PRM') and jrgu.group_id = jrrm.group_id and jrrm.hierarchy_type IN ('MGR_TO_MGR', 'MGR_TO_REP') and jrrm.resource_id = aaa.resource_id and TRUNC(jrrm.start_date_active) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and TRUNC(NVL(jrrm.end_date_active, SYSDATE)) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) and aaa.group_id = jrrm.group_id and jrrm.parent_resource_id = :7 and jrrm.parent_resource_id <> jrrm.resource_id and ROWNUM = 1
